attributes.action: Going to the toilet is a human right, it should be allowed during lesson.
attributes.additional_details: Especially for young teenage girls not being able to go to the toilet when they need to is crucial and really should be a human right just as much as drinking water is , If you’re allowed to drink water in glass and you should be allowed to go to the toilet as well, it works both ways .
attributes.background: There should be laws and legislation put in place for young people to be able to go to the toilet freely during class .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require schools to let children use the toilet at all times in the school day
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731355
